title: M/T CONSTELLATION - INQUIRY FOR ANY KIND OF SUPPLY OR REPAIR JOB REQUISITION IN CHITTAGONG & MONGLA PORT, BANGLADESH.
content:
Dear Sir/Mam

Greetings of the day,

We are pleased to introduce "Chittagong Marine Supplier & Services" as a leading ship supplier based in Chittagong/Mongla Port, Bangladesh.

With a strong focus on providing exceptional service and high-quality products, we cater to the diverse needs of vessels calling at these ports. Short Description of our services. 

 ◉ Ships Supply Services; Provisions, Technical, Spare Parts And Stores.  ◉ Owners and Charterers Protective Services.  ◉ Delivery Of Crew Mail & Courier Packages.  ◉ Bunker, Fuels, Lubricants And Fresh Water Supply.  ◉ Crew Changes, Hotel Accommodations, Shore Pass Arrangements Etc.  ◉ Crew Welfare–Doctor, Dentist, eMail, Internet, Mobile Prepaid Cards.  ◉ Underwater Inspection At Anchorage.  ◉ Internet Protocol (IP) Configuration Services.  ◉ CCTV Camera Installation And Repair Services.  ◉ Information Technology (IT) Installation and Repair Services.  ◉ Follow-Up Activities With Workshops, Contractors Etc.  ◉ Ship Spare Parts Clearance And Delivery ◉ Cash To Master Deliveries.  ◉ Inward & Outward Clearance ◉ Liaison With Local Authorities.  ◉ Supervision Services ◉ Communication Assistance.  ◉ Tug and Barge Arrangements ◉ Motor Boat Services.

Agency Services : 

* Vessel agent, Port agent, Trump & Liner & OPA-  * Specialized for Ownership/ Class/ Flag Change-  * Heavy Lift/ Project Cargo Handling-  * Lighter/ Barge supplier-  * Berthing management-  * Dry dock support-  * Ship Chartering-  * Cargo Handling-  * Arrangement of conditional surveys, on/off hire surveys, and cargo surveyors-

If you need any kinds of service OR emergency support in Bangladesh, Please inform with us without any hesitation.

//We are waiting for your kind reply//

Rk Rezaul-Rakib__Director, Chittagong Marine Supplier & Services,

MOB: +88 01632306505 (Urgent WhatsApp/ WeChat) Office: Rahman Villa 2nd Floor,Boropole,Halishahar. chittagong-4216,Bangladesh E-Mail: chittagongmarine.mgt@gmail.com E-Mail: chittagongmarine.serv@gmail.com E-Mail: chittagongmarine.supply@gmail.com
creator: chittagongmarine.supply

title: Why do some e-mails and folders disappear without any notice?
content: Why do some e-mail folders disappear without any notice?
creator: waffolder1

title: mailの送信が出来ない
content:
メッセージを送信できませんでした。送信（SMTP）サーバーmail.urara-kmd.jpとの接続がタイムアウトしたため、メッセージの送信できませんでした。再度試してくださいとメッセージが出ます。

アカウント設定で確認していますが、設定は何も変わっていないようです。
creator: linkizumi

title: Are the memory issues ever going to be resolved?
content: 142.0 64-bit is still doing the crazy Inbox disappearing and waiting for it to come back. I have to click on the profile and then back to the inbox. I am just looking at and/or deleting the many spams I get and the box just vaporizes. It is very frustrating. I was under the assumption that this was going to be addressed in 140+??
creator: dsooley

title: Thunderbird storage
content: I suddenly have a notification (at bottom, right side) that my Thunderbird storage is 98% full. I have just spent an hour culling my files and have deleted a huge amount of email and yet it still says it's 98% full. Why is this happening? What can I do to fix this issue? Thank you.
creator: cathsparks

title: Download all attachments function not working
content: Overnight my PC had a normal software update. Since then, when I click the arrow symbol to download all attachments, nothing happens. The only way to download attachments now is to click the magnifying glass, then save. For my work I need to download multiple attachments from multiple emails a day so it's pretty inconvenient.
creator: admin606
